Text: Do the add to favorites work on this version?? To save the favorites
Yes, favorites do work on this version
No you cant save servers to favorites in this version. After you add the server, if you quit the game, the servers are gone. FUCK THIS SHIT.

Yes, you CAN save favorites in this release of CS 1.6. It has been tested on Windows XP, Windows 7 and Windows 8. If you can't, then you apparently have installed another release of game, not this one..
